item.description: Service Companies Baker Hughes Halliburton Superior Energy Services US Silica Upstream Companies Anadarko Petroleum Chevron Devon Energy Encana ExxonMobil Noble Energy QEP Resources Turn mobile devices horizontal for figures to display properly.
